attributes.action: reimburse stamp duty paid by first time buyers who completed their house purchase in the period between the end of the last concession (31 12 09) and the beginning of the concession announced in today's budget.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It was really good to see the concession on stamp duty for first time buyers announced in today's budget.  But I felt really peeved on behalf of my son and his colleague, (and probably many others), who completed their house purchases in February and have had to scrape together the stamp duty.  It doesn't seem a fair deal to me.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
